KnowledgeBase.Title: vectorQuartInnerProduct

KnowledgeBase.HumanKeywords:
quarter polynomial product math
support vector functions kernel

Function.Description: The vectorQuartInnerProduct function returns the quart polynomial inner product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2.

Brief.Overview:
The vectorLogInnerProduct function returns the quart polynomial inner product of the two Number Vector arguments x1 and x2. The C formula used is as follows:

(* (setq k (+ 1.0 (vectorInnerProduct x1 x2))) k k k)
Brief.Usage: The vectorQuartInnerProduct function may be used as a kernel for support vector machine regression (see the svmRegression function).

Argument.Name: x1
Argument.Note: The first Number Vector to be multiplied

Argument.Name: x2
Argument.Note: The second Number Vector to be multiplied

Syntax.Return: The quart inner or dot product of the two vectors.
